audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: High-level aggregated claim about AI deployment across multiple use cases. While it implies functional optimization, it's too broad to assess specific replicable patterns.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific metrics (1,500 models, 370 use cases, SGD 1B value), but lacks detail on what functions are being optimized or how value is measured.
